text: We may employ other companies and people to perform tasks on our behalf and need to share your information with them to provide products or the Website to you; for example, we may use Google Analytics to track usage of our Website.

By using or accessing the Website or by using any Intelligage's hosted software or services (the "Intelligage Services") in any manner, you acknowledge that you accept the practices and policies outlined in this Privacy Policy, and you hereby consent that we may collect, use, and share your information in ways outlined below.
In the event of any actual or suspected unauthorized access to your Personal Information, Intelligage will notify you as soon as it is reasonably practicable, and we will provide you with any information and cooperation as may be reasonably required to enable you to mitigate the consequences of the unauthorized access.
We may use any aggregated data derived from or incorporating your Personal Information after you update or delete it, but not in a manner that would identify you personally.

Whenever you interact with our Website, we automatically receive and record information on our server from your browser or device, which may include your IP address, device identification, "cookie" information, the type of browser and/or device you're using to access our Website, and the page or feature you requested.

text: We neither rent nor sell your Personal Information in personally identifiable form to anyone.
